website_summaries.verdict: An affordable classic bench with a rustic wood finish.
pros: This more affordable bench looks great and is well-built
Comfortably seats two and measures 42.5 inches wide by 14 inches deep by 17.75 inches wide
cons: Bolt holes may be misaligned, making assembly difficult

customer_reviews.title: Need A Leg - Please
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this bench but one of the legs was covered with some sort of heavy growth/mildew. I did not remove the plastic sleeve, took pictures, then threw it away. The other three legs in the very same box were fine?! All I need is another leg. When I try to go to returns/missing items they expect me to return it. I just need a leg...please. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Bench is darker than advertised
customer_reviews.text: The only negative comment I have is that the bench is darker than advertised. I wanted a lighter wood, so that it would match my dining table and chairs. Other than that, the bench was super easy to assemble. You don't even need to look at the instructions to figure this one out. The material came in excellent condition and arrived fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench!! Very easy to put together!! Very sturdy! Bench arrived exactly as described, matches my table perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Can take a bit of weight...
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've had this for a few months, I can attest to a weight limit. We have had a variety of different sizes people sit on it: 125lbs teen, 220lbs adult, 350lbs adult, and 400lbs adult. When two 220lb adults sit on this together, it does start to bow in the middle. They can feel comfortable if weight is shifted right on top of the legs. This also matched our old oak table relatively well. If your family is composed of individuals weighing less than 200lbs, you can fit two people on this. Or it can be a one person bench, where the person do not sit in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: lmpromptu

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench!
customer_reviews.text: I looked around quite a bit for bench for our entry way and decided on 2 of these. They were delivered quick and undamaged. Very easy to assemble, my four little kiddos did it (all under 7) in about 10 mins, with some supervision from me. Very solid and sturdy- just what I was looking for. I would definitely recommend this product as en entry bench or a dining bench.
customer_reviews.author: P.D.D

customer_reviews.title: Ashley Furniture Signature Design-Berringer Dining Bench-Rectangular/Rustic Brown
customer_reviews.text: "The 'Ashley Furniture Signature Design-Berringer Dining Bench-Rectangular/Rustic Brown' arrived promptly, in good shape and as promised. Relatively easy to assemble, the bench is sturdy, functional and quite nice to look at. The bench is currently placed in front of one of our bedroom windows, and serves as a sometime window bench. We've never bought such furniture online (Amazon) before, and much prefer to go to a furniture showroom. Obviously, with the ongoing pandemic, it's tough to make such shopping journeys to our local Macy's. We prefer actual human interactions, but we're also happy with this online purchase of this lovely sitting bench, too. Enjoy!!!"
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Yamamoto

customer_reviews.title: It’s not put together properly and I can’t attach the legs!  Whyyyyy?
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this bench when it arrived until I had to put it together. 2 of the legs attach perfectly and 2 are not even right! I can’t tell if it’s the legs or the corner that the legs are supposed to attach to. I tried to figure a way to drill new holes to ‘help’ attach the leg, but it just isn’t possible. I have 2 legs firmly attached and now amazon wants me to send it back, I’m having a hard time getting them off. This is tricky - I am worried about breaking the legs to get them off for shipping. Ugh. Too bad, I really loved this bench!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ostlund

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, but chips easily!
customer_reviews.text: Got this just 5 days ago, absolutely love this bench, it is pretty much exactly as shown online, great warm wood color at an incredible price. Seemed extremely sturdy, it's heavy. Has a double function at my house: as a hallway bench and if needed additional seating for dinner table, just perfect! But discovered two chipped spots yesterday, without even having it moved yet. I only put my winter jacket on it while putting on boots. Fixed it with black & orange marker, but still, did NOT expect this from Ashley furniture. Now we have to be careful, no fun. I guess, you DO get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: ALLIL

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and matches my table and chairs perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Great bench. Directions say it takes 2 or more people to put together but I had no trouble getting it assembled by myself. It is solid wood, well made, and went together very easily. It is heavy!! Which is a good thing especially if you have children! Looks great and I couldn't be happier. Thanks!! (I tried to add photo but apparently I am more technologically challenged than I realized!)
customer_reviews.author: suzee918

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We received the shipment today, extremely easy to assemble, for the price you can't beat it, good quality, color etc. I placed it in the front living room area by the window, to use as a table, can also be used as a small sofa table as well. This way I have the availability of using it elsewhere and when company comes at the kitchen/dining table for additional seating. Appears to be constructed with wood and veneers. I wish the Ashley Furniture would list the weight limit for this bench, checked their website and others nothing listed.
customer_reviews.author: MLK

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Wooden Bench
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench! So much so that I bought two of them for each side of my table. The price is very fair and it was simple for me to assemble it. The bench fits two adults or 3 kids. For some reason Kids love to sit next to each other on benches! The color does not "match" my lighter colored wood table but that does not concern me as I love mixing wood colors throughout my home. I see this as a very versatile size for various locations of anyone's home, bedroom, foyer, dining room, kitchen etc. I highly recommend this bench to anyone on a budget like me. Made in Vietnam.
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: Love This Bench - Cottage White
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench which completes the Ashley Bolanburg table and chair group that we had purchased earlier. Currently it sits in our living room at a low picture window, where we can use it for additional seating or a seat that our puppy can watch out the window. If we need more seating at the table, we can move it to use it there also. It is well built, and I love that the fabric matches our Bolanburg chairs, bringing together the look from dining to living room. I definitely would purchase again. The assembling instructions were not specific to the bench, which I found odd, however, it was easy to figure out and put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jo H.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to assemble.  Great bench for the bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy bench to assemble. Took 10 minutes. It arrived well packaged and in excellent shape. This bench is sturdy, beautiful and works well at the end of the bed manufactured by same company. Very happy with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: The wood is beautiful. The dimensions are correct. You can tell the wood had some imperfections (probably from the factory) but were covered up with paint that doesn't match the wood. It is easy to assemble. The instructions are easy to read. We were unable to put 1 leg on because the bench was built incorrectly. Pieces of the wood don't line up correctly and therefore we can't put 1 leg on. We will probably need to sand-down the wood to make the leg fit. We can't be bothered to send it back--too much work. It isn't sturdy because there are only 3 legs currently attached. It is poor craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy bench. It's held up well after almost 3 years of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I cannot assemble things. I don't even try. But this was a snap and only took a few minutes to screw on the legs. The wood seems solid and the bench is sturdy. Highly recommend and I am not a fake reviewer! I like fakespot web site.
customer_reviews.author: Grey the Elder

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness and craftsmanship. Only thing is the cushion on my bench came with a large indentation that will not smooth out. Too much trouble to send back something must has been laid on it during packing. Otherwise I would give 5 stars. I'm now looking to purchase matching dining room furniture.
customer_reviews.author: aprille

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: One of the legs was difficult to screw on. We tried it on other corners. Made no difference. We finally decided to tighten it the best we could. Bench was sturdy for three weeks. One leg just fell off and the bench topped. This is not just a metaphor for my last relationship, but also a crappy bench.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Moody

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and looks great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the warehouse deal so we were able to get this for roughly $45 which was too good to pass up. It is a darker stained wood, it looks slightly darker than the photo in the listing which I had read in other reviews, however that was perfect for us because we have a dark colored dining set. This added roughly two to three new seats at our dining room table which is awesome because we didn't have to buy a whole new kitchen table set when we welcomed our fourth child.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Kasprzyk

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: One of the leg assembly points was not properly fit to allow the leg to be bolted onto the bench. Only found that out after assembling the other 3 legs. I've assembled a lot of much more complex stuff in my life. This was not going to work without me modifying the piece, I preferred to pass on that opportunity. Three out of four is a good average for baseball, not so much for bench assembly.
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Great buy would buy again but make sure it has hardware to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Pros-I love this kitchen bench. It was eastern assemble is very sturdy. On top of everything else it was a great price. Cons- I make four trips to a hardware store that’s 0 min away from my home. The bench came with no hardware! I wasn’t upset at first till the four this turned into gas wasted time wasted and it donated me half of what I purchased the bench for. Then I was really upset.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Cute, color matches, and decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and matches our sort of antique-y dining set (it's a generation old) perfectly. It took maybe 10 minutes to put together, and instructions are simple. Even the allen wrench is included with the hardware, and that's a plus! Item did arrive with two small chips missing off the top -- not sure how due to how well it was packed and protected. I don't mind the chips as they're going to show up with kids anyway, and the item is easy to return with Amazon so I'm not taking an stars off for it.
customer_reviews.author: Stuffy

customer_reviews.title: Nice for entryway
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench. It sits in the hall by the door. Nice to have a place to take off your shoes or winter boots. Or just to have a place to set your groceries when you come in the door. It’s very sturdy. No wobbles. I think it could support a lot of weight, but I don’t know how much. At least 400 pounds
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench was purchased to place a large TV on. It was easy to put together and the TV fits perfectly. The instructions say it takes two people to put it together. Not true it was easily put together by myself. The hardest part of putting the bench together was getting it out of the box and packing.
customer_reviews.author: Msgr. John R. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Great Bench! Very sturdy! I've been wanting a bench for our dining table because my youngest loves to sit right next to her sister and they always end up sharing one seat. Not too comfortable or safe. This bench solved that problem for us. It matches the style of our table perfectly for a great price too. It did need to be assembled but it wasn't too difficult or confusing to do. Legs are solid wood. The bench itself looks like veneer but it doesn't look bad. Someday, down the road, it wouldn't be too hard to replace that with a wood plank. Very easy to clean up. Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Coffill

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but Has Some Damage
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bench, but it has its imperfections. Arrived damaged with a couple chips in paint, wood, and some black scuffing. Was very annoying to put together, but that's only because I hate hex keys due to my carpal tunnel. It's also way more brown than expected. Overall, its okay and I'm going to use it, but if I find something better, this is getting sold.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my plants so it seems pretty sturdy to me, but sure what the everyday life sitting on it would do. It’s on the smaller side and it’s not to wide which is why it was perfect to use on my bedroom for more plants! It was very easy to put together, I did it by myself and I’m not crafty like that in 15 minutes. The wood is pretty nice quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: definately worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This bench fits nicely with mybkitchen table. Comfortably fits 2 large adults, 3 kids would not be a problem to sit there. Its a dark brown, and the wood blends well. Easy to set up, the hardest part was cutting up the box to throw it away, ha. Actually thinking about getting another one and ditching the kitchen chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jaypeetzoh

customer_reviews.title: Great little bench to double as a small coffee table!
customer_reviews.text: After my last so-called "all-wood" entertainment center (not purchased on Amazon, my mistake!), I was a little skeptical about this all-wood bench. I am pleasantly surprised at it's excellent quality and even craftsmanship. Solid wood and heavy. Makes a great little coffee table in our apartment (nicely balancing the large sofa we just bought), yet more than sturdy enough to double as a bench when needed. I'm already trying to figure out where I might be able to use another!
customer_reviews.author: ElizAnne

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench...I purchased this with 4 chairs and the matching table and is beautiful...Saved money by buying this thru Amazon versus Ashley Store. Was easy to put together....My only complaint was the delivery. He was supposed to put on my porch and he refused, putting it in my garage. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Minder-Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: LOL It's sturdy and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Lovely bench. We use it as a coffee table. LOL It's sturdy and looks beautiful. The price is twice what we paid -, though. I paid $32 and it's offered now for almost $60. Great bench, but look around for it at a cheaper price, especially since it fluctuates here.
customer_reviews.author: Thankful Grateful Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to put together, and it is very sturdy. You might need a cushion or a pillow if you're not used to sitting on such a hard flat surface. I got mine on sale, I wouldn't want to spend over $50 for it, but looking at the market it may be worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable cushion
customer_reviews.text: The benches are heavy which is nice, however the fabric on top is already fraying just after 3 months. The cushion is also very thin and not comfortable. I'm very disappointed that I can't return them because I"m over the time limit. I just think furniture should last longer than 3 months. DO NOT PURCHASE THESE IF YOU PLAN ON USING THEM EVERYDAY!
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these benches and will soon need a 3rd for our large family. One bench we have had 7-8 years and it’s been holding up great! So easy to assemble that a 10 year old was able to do so by himself.
customer_reviews.author: A&K

customer_reviews.title: Craftsmanship needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together with one exception. One of the screws wouldn’t screw in until I removed one of the washers. There’s a couple of sections on top where it looks likes it’s been spliced together. Since I plan to put a cushion on it, this isn’t a huge deal. I wouldn’t mention it except that one section is significantly darker than the rest.
customer_reviews.author: T. bos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for bathroom bench over a year ago so wife and I could both sit down at same time. It was simple to assemble and is still as sturdy as when first assembled. No wobbles, even with us both on it. It is solid wood and well made. Finish has not faded or stained in spite of wet towels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coloring, solid bench.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in excellent condition. Beautiful color, very solid! Assembles with 8, 8mm Allen head screws. Comes with Allen wrench, but used ratchet and bit for much quicker assembly(about 5 minutes). Easily hold the weight of two grown adults 220lbs plus each.
customer_reviews.author: R. March

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, heavy
customer_reviews.text: I planned to use as an inexpensive bench for the front porch but will be using it for a coffee table instead. Very pretty, heavy, substantial, sturdy, Nicely stained and finished and easily assembled (10 minutes - 2 bolts per leg need Allen wrenched into place/ wrench supplied ) I bought it when the price was $40 and am thrilled with this purchase. I concur with another reviewer who said it was their best Amazon purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MitzyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what we were looking for. We have a big family and a large 5x5 table. I wanted to be able to have ample seating but be able to push the table closer to the wall when not everyone is home. These slid under the table perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great little bench!
customer_reviews.text: Great little bench, especially for the price! We purchased our dining room table from an antique store, with a leaf and 4 chairs. I wanted seating for 6 and so bought the ashley bench. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and how well it fit and matched. I appreciate how slim it is, so it's not too bulky and in the way. It easily fits 2 adults or 3 children. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is at my small entry way. It gives us a place to remove our shoes/boots etc. The dimensions are perfect for us. The color and quality and price are great, I researched for a while and took at chance on this one. Its just what I wanted. I wanted a true brown or variations of brown. not reddish brown. It meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in Shipping 😢
customer_reviews.text: I’m so sad my bench arrived damaged. I can return it for almost the cost I paid for it (having shipping deducted). Now my new dining bench has a weakened corner. Yes, I set it up anyway after weighing my options. It fits my table well and other than the horrible corner damage appears stable and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: I do most of my non-food shopping on here

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Bench!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench! Perfect for my entryway, I just need to add a pillow or two for decor. I did not have any issues with chips or damage. It was packed pretty good. Bench is heavy and great quality! Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M3

customer_reviews.title: No Hardware Enclosed!  Moldy smelling packaging and box with dents, taping, and a hole on the top
customer_reviews.text: No hardware was included in the box in order for us to put it together. Attempts have been made to reach the manufacturer with no reply. This item was to be an addition that we looked forward to for our dining table. In additional to the moldy smell of packaging, etc. this is very disappointing. Once we have the hardware and can assemble this bench unless it falls apart upon seating we're optimistic that this purchase can become an excellent one for our enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: LillaVer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Value. After reading the reviews on people receiving the bench damaged, I was hesitant to purchase. However I purchased it and am happy I did. It is packaged very well and it would take a lot to damage during shipping. I put it together using the 8 supplied bolts in about 10 minutes. Highly recommend this reasonably priced bench.
customer_reviews.author: ccargnino

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench
customer_reviews.text: The bench was ordered as additional seating at our dining room table during the holidays. We had been searching for a simple style that would look nice & this is perfect. It has no cushion but you could easily make or purchase one to match the dining chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Macey

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Quality bench for the price. We needed something near the garage door so people could sit while putting their shoes on or taking them off. Needed something functional not fancy, but this bench is perfect. Affordable and looks nice. Very easy to put together and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: JMAMA

customer_reviews.title: A very nice piece of furniture with many uses!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the bet buys for the money. I bought it as a tv stand for my bedroom but liked it so much bought another one as a coffee table for my new couch. It's a perfect size....very pretty and sturdy. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality, solid, attractive, and practical wooden bench
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this bench is surprising. I did not expect a solid wood, nicely stained bench for $50. I purchased the bench as extra seating at our dining room table. The bench can sit two easily. However, after receiving the item, I decided it would look better as a sitting place on my stair landing. The bench is smaller than I expected, but I didn't really pay attention to the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Anna L. Todd

customer_reviews.title: quality product! excellent delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my benches on 9/29 with a delivery date of 10/7 and it arrived on 10/1!! They came in perfect condition, packed extremely well, easily unpacked. The instructions said it would take 2-3 people to put together properly (2-3??). I had my TWO benches completely built within 20 minutes - and all by myself! :) It comes with an allen wrench, no other tools needed. So easy! The product itself is beautiful! It's very solid, heavy and matches my table perfectly. Color as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great smaller table for a smaller space!
customer_reviews.text: Serves it's purpose - no complaints! Looks good for what I had in mind! Couldn't ask for a better piece for the price
customer_reviews.author: Veronica M.

customer_reviews.title: High quality bench !
customer_reviews.text: Had to write a review about this bench. Absolutely beautiful. Didn’t expect it to be this nice. Super easy to assemble, took like 5 minutes. These people that show damage , it’s your carrier, not The actual furniture. This is a gorgeous bench that we have in our bedroom to help me to sit and put my socks on lolol. Sturdy and rich looking
customer_reviews.author: Pam Rose

customer_reviews.title: Solid bench for decent price.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for about a month and it seems sturdy enough. We have two small children that sit on the bench and it holds up nicely to their clowning around. It also handles my weight well (and I'm a larger woman). It was easy to assemble and seems to be made of pretty solid materials. Cleans up easily, too.
customer_reviews.author: WellRoundedMom

customer_reviews.title: Super solid!
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for my 3 kids, since our dining area is kinda small. I needed something solid and legs that were thick, since 2 kids are hitting tween years lol It came super quick and no scratches or chips on it!! It was super easy to assemble and feels super sturdy. I just got it yesterday, so time will tell if it lasts, but as of now I’m really happy with this purchase. The bench is definitely solid wood (heavy)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Prado

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It is elegant, and well-made, and the size was just perfect for us. We love this bench. It sits by the wall of my daughter's room that has a big hanging mirror. She found its use as a place to do a sewing project, and have gloves and hats baskets underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Howl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, and great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This good-looking bench is a great value for the money. (I bought it when it went on sale at a significant discount.) It was easy to put together and seems very solid. It's just the right size to put at the end of the bed. Our bench did have a couple of very small scratches on the top surface when it arrived, but they are so minor that I'm not going to worry about it, especially at this price point. I'm sure it will get scratched up from use within a short time anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bench for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is awesome! We needed extra seating for our cheap kitchen table and didn't want to spend a fortune. Local places had benches for $150+ which is more than we got our table AND four chairs for on Black Friday several years ago. Found this one on Amazon for $50 and it's perfect. Easy to assemble, perfect height, great quality, super solid, and easily fit an adult and our 7 year old for dinner. I was honestly not expecting much for $50, but it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jellybean

customer_reviews.title: Wrong length screws
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the new used bench to save myself some money. I was sorry I did. The bench arrived in new condition, but when assembling it, the screws were at least 3/4 inch to short. Instead of returning it, I chose to purchase longer screws at a hardware store. The screws ended up costing me more than my savings. After that one of the legs does not fit totally square like the other three, but since it is only used for my hallway between my condo and garage, I decided it wasn't worth returning. It is barely noticeable and the bench sits level.
customer_reviews.author: Blake P.

customer_reviews.title: Not wood
customer_reviews.text: This bench is not wood. Mine started coming apart. It is particle board
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bench...
customer_reviews.text: I love this all wood bench & the color is perfect in my hallway. I use it to sit & take off work & snow boots & store them right under. It's perfect for when you come right in the door. Excellent quality at a great price, easy to set up & looks very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2ShopOnline2

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Purchased 2 to use on an awesome table I got with no chairs and the color, and measurements worked perfectly! Very sturdy so far and feels like great quality. The seat area is wider than other benches I saw which makes for a more comfortable sitting which is the best part of this bench. Go for it! A.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff takes Disney  on Youtube

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This bench is perfect. Super easy to assemble. Sturdy and very nice looking. I bought two. One for the mud room so we can sit and put shoes on/off. The other one is at the front entrance for similar function.
customer_reviews.author: Benito M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hallway bench.
customer_reviews.text: We got this to use for putting on boots and shoes near the front door. We liked it so much we got a second one for the backdoor. Very sturdy and good looking. Easy to assemble. We put boot trays under them. They fit perfectly. This is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: wizardshat

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together - took me five minutes max by myself. The screws and washers come already put together for all - all you do is literally online the leg holes up to the screw holes and tighten with the Alan key and BAM your done! The bench is extremely sturdy. My apartment living is very tiny and there’s just no good set up for a real coffee table, so we got this instead because it’s long and thin - it’s perfect! Super sturdy and very nicely put together!
customer_reviews.author: Vittoria Lynn Valentino

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and beautiful bench!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is incredible! The assembly was very simple and easy to follow. Because of the real wood, the bench itself is very light -- easy to move from place to place. I appreciate the rounded edges as well. We have used it as both a dining bench and also a mini-table for our kids. It was more than worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Yee

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bench for almost a year and a half. It arrived in perfect condition and was easy to put together. It matches our table perfectly. Very sturdy, two people can fit-not petite. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heather G

customer_reviews.title: Nothing was missing and zero damage to the product.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this bench. I bought it to place pillows on under my living room window. It looks great. I received it faster than expected and took little time to bolt the four legs to it. Nothing was missing and zero damage to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how good it looks
customer_reviews.text: This bench is beautiful. Easy to assemble. Very sturdy. I can't believe how inexpensive it was. $70 for this beautiful bench. Don't hesitate on this. You will not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blane R. Schippers

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is a great small, 2 seater bench. Beautiful finish, easy assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but Damaged!
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a damaged package, but the top of this bench had several smashed edges & scratches. I don’t want to repackage & hassle with shipp No back, so I used furniture markers to fill in the particle board showing.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great price & quality
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bench for my dining room table to replace 2 broken chairs. The table is a dark wood so I hoped that this would be a similar enough shade. It is a bit lighter but since my table usually has a cloth over it you can't really tell. It arrived in great shape and was a snap to put together. It's light enough for my small kids to pull it out and sit down, and it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy, Aesthetically Pleasing
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these to furnish an empty home. It took me longer to unpack and clean up the packaging than to put each of them together. The craftsmanship on these is excellent and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Ceebee

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench was easy to assemble and looks sharp. We have the table and chairs from the set and it matches perfectly. It is sturdy and it works well for us to add extra seating.
customer_reviews.author: DZ

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, solid construction, classic color. I put mine at the foot of the bed and it's comfortable to put your bag on or sit to put on socks/shoes. It's strong enough to sit two average adults (although they may be a little cozy).
customer_reviews.author: Yuliya

customer_reviews.title: Double duty as coffee table or as seating
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest things to put together, but they look great once they're done. I'm using two of them next to each other as a coffee table, and I pull them to the side to use as seating when I want to pull out the big table.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy place to sit
customer_reviews.text: This bench is so handy to have at the foot of our bed easy to sit down to put my shoes on. Very sturdy my husband weighs 200 lbs and he uses it all the time. Definitely would recommend this bench, it is pretty and very useful to have.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Stockwell

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: If you need a bench this size, this is a "no brainer". It is easy to assemble and well made. Very sturdy. Nicely finished. We actually use it as a coffee table. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: retired303

customer_reviews.title: looks great, super simple to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a wood dining bench for months. They either were very expensive, $150 or more, or had to be bought with a set. Very pleased with the quality, price, and ease of assembly. I was a little put off when they kept offering assembly for an additional fee, glad I didn't do it! Just a matter of screwing in the 4 legs with the tool they provide!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne D.

customer_reviews.title: I Love My Sitting Bench!
customer_reviews.text: Look how beautiful my dinning table looks with my Ashley Furniture sitting bench.....I LOVE IT!! It came with everything to set it up and it was easy took me 15mins to take out of the box, similar to put it together not very long. I'm so glad I picked out the dark wood because it matches my dining table and now my table is complete :)
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really great bench, especially for the price. It matches our table almost perfectly and is a great length for our kids. Super easy to put together and we got it fast. I will be ordering another for the other side of the table!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: These are so much bigger and beefier than I expected. They are thick solid wood and easy to put together. I bought 2 for my dinning table and am more than happy with them! I would recommend them to anyone wanting to add beautiful seating.
customer_reviews.author: Lea YB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one to make a "nook" in our playroom and double as an extra chair in the kitchen when we have guests. I also needed one that could support more weight, as there are a fewer stockier people who'd be using it. We liked it so much and it fit our needs so well that we immediately bought a 2nd bench! Great price. Met all of our needs. We've tossed a sheepskin rug on it for softness, and it's perfectly comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: I used them for a great "camping" themed New Year's Eve party outside on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these, they came quickly, and I was able to assemble them quickly! I used them for a great "camping" themed New Year's Eve party outside on my patio, next to a roaring fire, and three grills -- #hygge --they are really sturdy and I am so pleased with the price!
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyGinger

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and good looking
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and attractive bench. Easy assembly. We keep it at the foot of our bed. Hubby sits on it to put on his shoes. Now our bedroom chair is no longer used. When needing extra seating in the living room or at the dining room table, we bring the bench. Best choice of furniture I have made in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: it has a beautiful low luster satin finish
customer_reviews.text: Instead of a shiny lacquered finish, it has a beautiful low luster satin finish. Very well constructed, very sturdy. Comes with its own Allen wrench for , assembling the legs with 8 bolts, (2 for each leg) and metal washers. Assembled in 8-10 mins. Seats 2 adults, or 2 adults 1 child, or 3 children. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lola GetzIt

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench for the end of my bed to go along with the matching furniture. I love it. It adds the perfect touch to my bedroom. Super sturdy. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: D Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bench that goes well with my dining room table. I have a rustic white table with a cottage feel and I was looking for a bench to go with it. It’s beautiful, comfortable and my kids love it. Love the nailhead trim! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: This product was obviously returned by another customer. Missing bolts, parts laying lose inside the packing. We love the look of the bench and hopefully will be able to purchase parts at our local hardware store to put it together. DISAPPOINTED that it was sold as "NEW"
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because the chairs that came with our table were really flimsy. It’s not an exact match to the wood, but it is pretty close!! Easy to assemble, I did it by myself 8 months pregnant. Very sturdy. No issues with the finish or corners being damaged like other reviews. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill D.

customer_reviews.title: Missing legs
customer_reviews.text: The table looks nice, but unfortunately arrived with only two legs... quite the hassle. Perhaps when my replacement arrives I can update the review.
customer_reviews.author: jlwmcknight

customer_reviews.title: Great High Quality Bench!
customer_reviews.text: This Ashley bench is a beautiful addition to my home. It is easy to attach the legs and it is ready for use. Looks great, like an expensive piece of furniture at a small price. It is quality built all wood, with strength to withstand usage. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. and Linda C. Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wooden bench
customer_reviews.text: We needed a bench for the grandchildren to sit comfortably around our dining room table. This table is perfect! It was very easy to assemble and is very sturdy. When not in use in the dining room, it fits beautifully at the foot of our bed. Who knew??!! Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine F. Kalllio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sturdy dining bench
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality! Beautiful bench that seems line it is going to hold up in a house with 4 children! Looks great at my dining room table, we bought two, in for each side. Easy to assemble as well!
customer_reviews.author: MyBryan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble, nice furniture piece
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 260 and this is a very strong, stable bench. Can comfortably seat 2 people. I use the bench daily and am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Happy Find
customer_reviews.text: I never thought in my wildest imagination that I would have been able to find the bench to my table I purchase 10 years ago from Ashley. Great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Banana63

customer_reviews.title: SO pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This bench came very well packaged, was in perfect condition, very easy to assemble, just the four legs, it's sturdy and it matches my table perfectly. I love it, and thought the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: L101

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 benches & am very pleased with them. They are strong & pleasant looking. They are very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: crystal hughes

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected, look is sleek, easy to assemble (just attach legs) and very sturdy for the price. would recommend if you are looking for a basic bench without padding
customer_reviews.author: Missy B

customer_reviews.title: A perfect piano bench
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for 6 months. So far so good. This works well for duets at our vintage Baby Grand piano, and at our dining room table in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Strong, beautiful all-wood bench
customer_reviews.text: Well crafted bench, very study! Easily assembled in about 15 minutes and came very well packaged. Not a scratch on it. This is so well made that I almost can't believe it, you don't find real wood furniture like this for under $200 let alone under $100. It compliments my mission style kitchen table perfectly and easily sits two people. I have a small eating area so being able to eliminate two chairs is wonderful and makes the entire area feel less cramped. Would highly recommend this beautiful bench.
customer_reviews.author: Tekkiechikk

product_meta.title: Ashley Furniture Signature Design - Berringer Dining Bench - Rectangular - Vintage Casual - Rustic Brown Finish
product_meta.description: Color:Rustic BrownThis versatile bench serves up easy elegance, family style. The rich, rustic finish and simple profile are always in vogue, whether your aesthetic is vintage, country or traditional. Dining room bench comfortably seats two.
feature_bullets: DINING ROOM BENCH: A simple, clean-lined wooden bench is always in style. This one takes it up a notch with thick table legs and a beautiful replicated grain
SEATS UP TO 2: Dining room benches are a great seating solution for hosting large groups. This bench can seat up to 2 people comfortably. Sturdy frame is crafted with veneers and engineered wood
RUSTIC WOOD FINISH: Whether your style is classic or brimming with farmhouse flair, this bench will fit right in with its rich, rustic finish and neat profile
LONG BENCH: Measuring 42.5” W x 14” D x 17.75” H, this bench is great for narrow entry ways, eat-in kitchen areas or dining room tables
EASY ASSEMBLY: Instructions, hardware and tools included
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget. Since 1945
